roleset.name: to make an itemized list of, classify

example.name: transitive
example.text: They pause only [*-1] to register little whimpers of distress and sighs of satisfaction , like tourists cataloging the sights [0] they 've seen [*T*-2] from the window of a bus .
example.arg: the sights [0] they 've seen [*T*-2] from the window of a bus
